svg.text: Two-Phase Genesis Transaction Workflow with Multi-Party Attestation

g.text: • JWT Bearer token required (except walkthrough endpoints)
• Tenant isolation enforced on all operations
• Supported algorithms: ED25519, NIST P-256, RSA-4096
• SHA-256 hash of canonical JSON (RFC 8785) for signing
• Immutable foundation for all future transactions
Sign SHA-256 hash with private key
